author: admin
title: Why Nigerian airlines are failing – Operators - Premium Times
text: Why Nigerian airlines are failing – Operators - Premium Times Premium Times The Airline Operators of Nigeria , AON, on Sunday attributed the poor performance of domestic airlines to multiple taxation by various agencies in the aviation sector. Nogie Meggisson, Chairman, AON, made the claim in Lagos while reacting to the …
